path_finding.download_graph.download_graph(latitude: float, longitude: float, radius: float) → igraph.Graph¶

Constructs a graph from street networks within a specified location.

Parameters

  • latitude (float) – the latitude of the center of the location

  • longitude (float) – the longitude of the center of the location

  • radius (float) – half the sidelength of the location covered

Returns

An igraph containing the street network within the specified location. Nodes have ‘x’ (latitude), ‘y’ (longitude), and ‘osmid’ (id) attributes. Edges have ‘length’ (distance), ‘grade’ (change in elevation), and ‘streetname’ attributes.

Elevate
